type.name: T:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar
type.summary: A control panel of the application.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.Dock
property.summary: Gets or sets the algorithm of the control positioning inside the control panel of the application.
property.value: A value of the enumeration . Default value — ApplicationBarDock.Left

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.GetDock(System.Windows.UIElement)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.SetDock(System.Windows.UIElement,Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBarDock)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.IsOpen
property.summary: Gets or sets the value, that indicates whether the control panel is opened at the moment. The control panel is opened by mouse right-button click by default.
property.value: True, if the control panel is opened; otherwise False. Default value = false.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.OnIsOpenChanged(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
method.summary: Called when the dependency property changes .
method.param: An old value of the dependency property .
A new value of the dependency property .

event.name: E:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.Opening
event.summary: The event is fired before the control panel is opened.

field.name: F:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.OpeningEvent
field.value: An identifier of the routed event .

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.OnOpening(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
method.summary: Is called when the routed event is generated .

event.name: E:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.Closing
event.summary: The event is fired before the control panel is closed.

field.name: F:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.ClosingEvent
field.value: An identifier of the routed event .

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.OnCLosing(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
method.summary: Is called when the routed event is generated .

event.name: E:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.Opened
event.summary: The event is fired after the control panel is opened.

field.name: F:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.OpenedEvent
field.value: An identifier of the routed event .

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.OnOpened(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
method.summary: Is called when the routed event is generated .

event.name: E:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.Closed
event.summary: The event is fired after the control panel is closed.

field.name: F:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.ClosedEvent
field.value: An identifier of the routed event .

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.OnClosed(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
method.summary: Is called when the routed event is generated .

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.StaysOpen
property.summary: Gets or sets the value, which corresponds to whether the control panel of the application is closed due to the lost of the focus.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.OnStaysOpenChanged(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
method.summary: Called when the dependency property changes .
method.param: An old value of the dependency property .
A new value of the dependency property .

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.PreventsOpen
property.summary: Gets or sets the value, which is corresponds to whether the control panel of the application can be opened after click of the right mouse button above the specified control.
property.value: True, if the control panel can be called by right-click on the specified control; False otherwise. Default value = True.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.GetPreventsOpen(System.Windows.UIElement)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.
method.ensures: The being returned value is positive.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.SetPreventsOpen(System.Windows.UIElement,System.Boolean)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.TransitionMode
property.summary: Gets or sets the value, which corresponds to such an animation, which is used when the control panel is closing/opening.
property.value: A value of the enumeration . Default value — ApplicationBarTransitionMode.Slide.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar.OnTransitionModeChanged(Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBarTransitionMode,Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBarTransitionMode)
method.summary: Called when the dependency property changes .
method.param: An old value of the dependency property .
A new value of the dependency property .
